segments.text: I have a little trouble , and I don't know how to deal with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the matter ? Please tell me . Maybe I can help you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tom wants me to write a recommendation letter for him , but I don't know how to write it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . I know about this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First you should have a salutation , which can be the company's or a person's name .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you can write about his performance in college , including his academic achievements and his competence .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can also state his personality traits , hobbies and relationships with schoolmates and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tom got along well with classmates . He is really a good boy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can write all his strengths in the recommendation letter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What should I write except these ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should also state that you are his class president , so you are qualified to write this recommendation letter
segments.speaker: S2
